title: International transportation to Portugal and Lithuania
description: Order the best tickets for the best flights.

baggage.title: Baggage:
baggage.light_luggage: Light luggage - free for one passenger: 1 piece of hand luggage (max. size 15x25x35 cm)
baggage.heavy_luggage: Heavy luggage - 1 piece of luggage up to 30 kg, size up to 30x60x80 cm in the luggage compartment

cancellation_info.title: Ticket cancellation information
cancellation_info.text: Up to 48 hours before departure: 90% From 48 to 24 hours before departure: 80% Less than 24 hours before departure: ticket is non-refundable
